DOC.brief_summary: Fatigue prevalent phenomenon Primary Sjøgrens syndrome ( PSS ) . Observations indicate cytokine IL-1 importance phenomenon . In study investigator block IL-1 give Anakinra ( IL-1 receptor antagonist ) patient PSS .
DOC.brief_title: Fatigue Interleukin-1 ( IL-1 ) Blockade Primary Sjøgrens Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel study effect fatigue daily injection Anakinra one month .
DOC.criteria: Primary Sjøgrens Syndrome accord EuropeanAmerican criterion Age 1880 year Written inform consent Hyper og hypothyreosis Malignant disease Parkinsons disease Multiple sclerosis Conditions diseases Anakinra contraindicate Mental depression ( BDI > 13 ) Neutropenia ( < 1.5*10.9 ) Frequent infection Pregnancy , lactate woman .
